allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: initialize project

Workforce intelligence platform deploying governed WiQ model to Power BI with auditable provenance and DADM compliance.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(if not exist "C:\\Users\\Administrator\\Dropbox\\++ Results Kit\\JobForge 2.0\\.planning\\research" mkdir "C:\\Users\\Administrator\\Dropbox\\++ Results Kit\\JobForge 2.0\\.planning\\research")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: complete project research

Files:
- STACK.md \(technology recommendations\)
- FEATURES.md \(feature landscape\)
- ARCHITECTURE.md \(system patterns\)
- PITFALLS.md \(domain pitfalls\)
- SUMMARY.md \(synthesis with roadmap implications\)

Key findings:
- Stack: Polars + DuckDB + semantic-link-labs + LlamaIndex + Qdrant
- Architecture: Medallion pipeline -> Hub-and-spoke WiQ -> Hybrid GraphRAG
- Critical pitfall: Layer responsibility leakage, DADM compliance, RAG without evaluation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: create roadmap \(5 phases\)

Phases:
1. Pipeline Infrastructure: PIPE-01
2. Data Ingestion: PIPE-02, PIPE-03, PIPE-04, PIPE-05, PIPE-06
3. WiQ Semantic Model: WIQ-01
4. Power BI Deployment: PBI-01
5. Data Governance and Lineage: GOV-01, CONV-01

All 10 v1 requirements mapped to phases.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs\(01\): capture phase context

Phase 01: Pipeline Infrastructure
- Implementation decisions documented
- DAMA DMBOK reference established
- Prototype reference workflow defined

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
